edu.iu.harp.client

Class Sender

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.client.Sender
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataSender

    public abstract class Sender
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class for sending the data

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sender(Data d, int destID, Workers w, byte command)
      To send data between workers, sender and receiver must both have valid IDs.
      Sender(Data d, java.lang.String h, int p, byte command)
      Use host and port directly do send between any to processes It can send data from a process other than workers or send data from a worker to a process outside.

              int destID,

      • Sender

        public Sender(Data d,
              java.lang.String h,
              int p,
              byte command)
        Use host and port directly do send between any to processes It can send data from a process other than workers or send data from a worker to a process outside. If send data from outside, data's worker ID should be unknown
        Parameters:

        command -
